channel.title: [PI]Old FroyoScape - A taste of Frogurt - Real oldschool, not an 'oldschool'
channel.description:
[center][size=24pt][b]Froyoscape - A taste of Frogurt.[/b][/size][/center]
[center][img]http://sphotos-b.xx.fbcdn.net/hphotos-ash4/3457_162984527177659_1302821311_n.jpg[/img][/center]
This is the old base of FroyoScape. This is the one that has tutorial island and such.
[size=18pt][b]Features[/b][/size]
[ul][li]Clipped NPC Walking[/li] [li]Clipped NPC Following[/li] [li]100 shops[/li] [li]1300 NPCs[/li] [li]Re-added npc walking[/li] [li]Grim Reaper[/li] [li]Nice switching[/li] [li]Six (leeched) skills[/li] [li]Tutorial Island (disabled)[/li] [li]Conventions look pretty tidy[/li] [li]No lag when walking[/li] [li]Cow Milking[/li] [li]A true 319 cache[/li][/ul]
[img]http://imageshack.us/a/img580/9315/loadingdata.png[/img] [img]http://imageshack.us/a/img138/3746/cowmilking.png[/img] [img]http://www.upload.ee/image/2761098/Switching.gif[/img] [img]http://www.upload.ee/image/2761148/No_lag_walking.gif[/img]
Back when I started FroyoScape, I leeched a few things. Now, I have gained more experience and have the capability to make my own things.
[b]Source - http://www.upload.ee/files/2871955/FroyoScape_-_Source.rar.html Client - http://www.upload.ee/files/2857172/FroyoScape_-_Client.rar.html
Package - http://www.upload.ee/files/2872011/FroyoScape_-_Package.rar.html [/b]
Enjoy!
Arham and Kodiak, Owner of FroyoScape and (Ex-)Head Admin of FroyoScape

item.title: [PI]Old FroyoScape - A taste of Frogurt - Real oldschool, not an 'oldschool'
item.dc:creator: @arham_4 arham 4
item.description:
@arham_4 wrote:

[quote=“Team_Rocket, post:43, topic:469918”]First of all, I encourage you to keep working on this. If you continue to have such a aggressive interest in programming at your age - you’ll be a Jesus Wizard at my age.

gj, don’t doubt that it’s nice

Trufax from my protege.

There’s a couple files missing Ahram:
prices.txt
NPCDrops.tsm.
Other than that. Good work

They’ve probably been converted or merged.[/quote]
I still have FroyoScape and am still working on it. But we switched sources, and this is the old one.

Read full topic
item.source: [PI]Old FroyoScape - A taste of Frogurt - Real oldschool, not an 'oldschool'

item.title: [PI]Old FroyoScape - A taste of Frogurt - Real oldschool, not an 'oldschool'
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

arham 4:

I never touched run.bat or compile.bat. I always used eclipse.

I’ll try re-compiling and post results by editing this post.
Edit:
Need to re-do the imports. I’ll be working on this for a bit
Edit2:
So I ran it in eclipse (Showed no errors on packaging etc)
and this is what I got:

item.cfg: file not found.
./Data/CFG/npc.cfg: file not found.
./Data/CFG/spawn-config.cfg: file not found.
shops.cfg: file not found.
./Data/cfg/global-objects.cfg: file not found.
./Data/cfg/doors.cfg: file not found.
.\data\cfg\prices.txt
.\Data\cfg\NPCDrops.TSM

Also, I don’t know what’s up. But I’m getting 100+ Errors on compile (100+ because when I fix some, more show up

Edit3: If anyone cares, here’s a working compiler.bat(JDK7.0)

@echo off
"C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.7.0\bin\javac.exe" -classpath deps/log4j-1.2.15.jar;deps/jython.jar;deps/xstream.jar;deps/mina.jar;deps/mysql.jar;deps/poi.jar;deps/slf4j.jar;deps/slf4j-nop.jar -d bin src\org\cleaned\action\*.java src\org\cleaned\clip\*.java src\org\cleaned\clip\region\*.java src\org\cleaned\rs2\configuration\*.java src\org\cleaned\rs2\content\*.java src\org\cleaned\rs2\content\combat\*.java src\org\cleaned\rs2\events\*.java src\org\cleaned\rs2\login\*.java src\org\cleaned\rs2\net\*.java src\org\cleaned\rs2\packets\*.java src\org\cleaned\rs2\packets\handlers\*.java src\org\cleaned\rs2\packets\handlers\bank\*.java src\org\cleaned\rs2\tasks\*.java src\org\cleaned\rs2\util\*.java src\org\cleaned\rs2\util\log\*.java src\org\cleaned\rs2\world\*.java src\org\cleaned\tick\*.java src\org\cleaned\rs2\model\*.java src\org\cleaned\rs2\configuration\*.java  src\org\cleaned\rs2\model\entity\*.java src\org\cleaned\rs2\model\item\*.java src\org\cleaned\rs2\model\items\*.java src\org\cleaned\rs2\model\minigames\*.java src\org\cleaned\rs2\model\players\*.java src\org\cleaned\rs2\model\quests\*.java src\org\cleaned\rs2\model\quests\cook\*.java src\org\cleaned\rs2\model\quests\tutorial\*.java src\org\cleaned\rs2\model\shop\*.java src\org\cleaned\rs2\model\skills\*.java 
pause

Read full topic
